emails.subject: Quarterly Review Meeting Request
emails.body: Hi Director,\nI'd like to schedule our quarterly performance review for next week. Please let me know your availability. The meeting will cover sales figures, project milestones, and budget planning.

emails.subject: Re: Quarterly Review Meeting Request
emails.body: Hello,\nThank you for reaching out. I am available on Tuesday or Thursday morning. Let me know which slot works best.
